title: A treatise of Melchisedek prouing him to be Sem, the father of all the sonnes of Heber, the fyrst king, and all kinges glory: by the generall consent of his owne sonnes, by the continuall iudgement of ages, and by plentifull argumentes of scripture.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
publisher: [By Richard Watkins] for Gabriel Simson and William White,
